author: achapman
title: Arsenal fans confused after club’s good luck tweet to England ace Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain as they play in Dortmund… and they think he’s been sold
text:
EFL 'Was About To Unfollow' Arsenal fans confused after club’s good luck tweet to England ace Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain as they play in Dortmund… and they think he’s been sold 
Winger set to feature against Germany but some supporters misread tweet as confirmation of a shock summer transfer By Anthony Chapman
